trusted_esps._description: Email Service Providers with known multi-tenant infrastructure

trust_levels._description: Available trust levels and their effects
trust_levels.skip_dns: Skip DNS validation (SPF/DKIM/DMARC) for this domain
trust_levels.skip_spoofing: Skip spoofing detection for this domain
trust_levels.esp: Treat as Email Service Provider (multi-tenant infrastructure)
trust_levels.full_trust: Skip all security checks for this domain (use sparingly)
